main.description: I am a Fullstack developer and I use react and spring to develop apps
main.bio: Brand new programmer that loves learning new things and enjoys the sentence compiled successfully. I speak Spanish , English and Hebrew. I immigrated to Israel independently at a young age (15), and developed adaptive abilities to different places. I always had the curiosity to learn a programming language , so when i started looking up famous languages and saw that java is one of the must famous languages in the world ,  i decided to take a course on it , altogether with fullstack.
